name: Argungu Fishing Festival
description: A colorful annual fishing festival celebrating local culture.

description: Traditional Yoruba festival honoring the goddess Osun.

name: Durbar Festival
description: Cultural horse riding festival showcasing local royalty.

name: Calabar Carnival
description: A month-long carnival with parades and performances.

description: Music festival featuring international jazz performers.

description: Colorful masquerade festival in Lagos Island.

description: Celebration of harvest and gratitude to the gods.

name: Sango Festival
description: Festival honoring the deity of thunder, Sango.
